restaurant.name: Cherry Bar - The Leela Ambience Convention Hotel

location.address: The Leela Ambience Convention Hotel, Maharaja Surajmal Road, Near Yamuna Sports Complex, Vivek Vihar, New Delhi
location.locality_verbose: The Leela Ambience Convention Hotel, New Delhi

event.description:
Celebrate your love for Cricket this season with friends and family at The Leela Ambience Convention Hotel in East Delhi. 

All cricket matches will be projected live on a big screen at the hotel’s popular Cherry Bar. The Leela Ambience Convention Hotel is offering exciting deals during all match screenings which offer value for money and encourage all guests to come and enjoy the sport.

The Live Screening will be a fun and unifying experience for all Cricket fans and guests in attendance. 

The hotel has THREE exclusive and exciting offers. 

KOHLI’S POWER PACK	
Unlimited imported drinks and snacks at INR 2000/- (plus taxes) per person	

DHONI’S HELICOPTER
Unlimited domestic drinks and snacks at INR 1500/- (plus taxes) per person	

ASHWIN’S DOOSRA
Unlimited beer at INR 1000/- (plus taxes) per person
event.title: Live Cricket Screening
event.disclaimer: Restaurants are solely responsible for the service; availability and quality of the events including all or any cancellations/ modifications/ complaints.
